title: Bitfort
author: Bitfort
content: I've received HelloFresh promo code worth $245. Since company is not active in my country (only US) I would like to pass it to someone who could perhaps utilize it.As per conditions (see below) it's valid only for new customers, cannot be sold etc. It might be linked to my email or name I put in (fake one) and might not work or be canceled ...but it's free so why not give a try.If anyone interested just ask here. I'll pick someone and PM the code.QuoteUse your gift by March 21, 2023.$245 Offer only valid for new customers with qualifying auto-renewing subscription purchase. 25 Free Meals, Free Shipping + 3 Surprise Gifts offer is based on a total discount applied over a 8-week period for a two-person, four-recipe subscription. Shipping fee applies on all deliveries after the first box. Discount may vary for other meal plans and sizes. '3 surprise gift' offer available after the purchase of your 4th, 6th and 8th boxes(total approx. value of three gifts). Not valid on premiums, meal upgrades, add-ons, taxes or shipping fees. May not be combined with gift cards or any other promotion. No cash value. Void outside the U.S. and where prohibited. Offer cannot be sold or otherwise bartered. HelloFresh has the right to end or modify any offer at any time. Additional restrictions may apply. See https://www.hellofresh.com/termsandconditions for more details.
